MLS # 71650413 - New
Condo - Townhouse, Shingle
8 Coppersmyth Way - Unit 8 List Price: $849,900
Lexington, MA 02421
Middlesex County
Unit Placement: End Total Rooms: 9
Unit Level: 1 Bedrooms: 3
Grade School: Bridge Bathrooms: 2f 1h
Middle School: Clarke Master Baths: Yes
High School: Lexington High Fireplaces: 1
Outdoor Space Avail: --
Handicap Access/Features: --
Directions: Marrett Rd to Coppersmyth Way
Remarks
Young, sparkling 2/3 bedroom unit at Lexington’s coveted Coppersmyth Way! Gleaming hardwood floors welcome you as you enter this sunny unit with spacious living/dining room combination boasting a gas fireplace and cathedral ceilings. The recently renovated kitchen offers stainless steel appliances and granite counters, as well as an eat-in breakfast area. The cozy sitting room or den with French doors is perfect for curling up with a book. First floor master bedroom with spacious bathroom and plentiful closet space. The second floor offers a spacious bedroom with walk in closet, large bathroom and third bedroom/office. Fully finished lower level walkout has a family room and office or possible guest suite. Surround sound speakers installed throughout. Rear deck offers privacy and wooded views. Conveniently located within walking distance to public transportation, Bridge Elementary School, the “Old Res” and Lincoln Field!

Disclosures: Washer, dryer, refrigerator and mirror in 2nd floor bedroom are negotiable. Seller requests September 15th closing. Third bedroom on 2nd floor lacks closet.
